msg: Modified superclass and methods for being able to use the portlet filter framework implemented on commons-consumer.

author: dlouzan
msg: Modified instantiating of ProducerRegistry: now instead of hard-instantiating ProducerRegistryImpl, delegate on ConsumerEnvironment for obtaining the right instance.

author: jleroux
msg: Printing prodcut barcode from product screens (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-557).
An easy way to get a product barcode, useful for POS at least...
